name: Pacman Remake for Dreamcast
description:
Pacman Remake for Dreamcast

Fun game based on the mystical PACMAN published by Atari in 1980, but now in an unpublished version for the Sega Dreamcast console. The game is different from a traditional PACMAN, in this adventure you can go through the walls, but it will take energy away from the player.

You can download it from the itch.io store and you can study its source code with the book "Video game programming: for Dreamcast", written by Rolando Fernández Benavidez, distributed on Google Play Books.
